title: Spotted: New Cannondale SuperSix F-Si XC Mountain Bike with dropped seatstays?
content:
Every once in a while, instagram delivers more than aspirational travel photos and thinly-veiled advertisements. In fact, if you keep an eye out for posts from certain pro riders, you might just catch a glimpse of an unreleased bike. In 2019 Cannondale updated its rocketship cross country hardtail F-Si with a few tweaks and an

The post Spotted: New Cannondale SuperSix F-Si XC Mountain Bike with dropped seatstays? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
